attributes.action: Stop taxing IT contactors out of business
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK IT industry relies on contractors to provide a flexible workforce to implement changes in systems from the defence industry to banking. In fact most business sectors need and use them. Since taking power this government has squeezed us year after year, with IR35, increases in corporation tax, income tax , and all the while it has make life easier for foreign nationals to work within the industry who pay no tax.
